actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to designate the maintenance of artificially undervalued currencies by foreign countries for certain purposes as unfair trade practices with respect to which the President may take remedial action under section 301 of the Trade Act of 1974.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to designate the maintenance of artificially undervalued currencies by foreign countries for export trade purposes as an unfair trade practice which the President may take action to remedy.

titles.title: A bill to designate the maintenance of artificially undervalued currencies by foreign countries for certain purposes as unfair trade practices with respect to which the President may take remedial action under section 301 of the Trade Act of 1974.
